elements.name: Check that user is taken to the correct page to purchase

steps.name: the user opens the browser to the ordering site
is redirected to the home page
The T-Shirt category Tab is Displayed and can be clicked
the user is redirected to the T-Shirt category page
Products are displayed to the user
Hovering over a Product Reveals the item add to cart button
User is able to click on the Add to Cart button
Click on the Proceed to Checkout button
Verify the user is redirected to the Shopping-Cart Summary page
Signin With a default user account on Authentication page
Click on the Create an account button
Create a new user account by adding in Personal details

steps.name: Enter user address
Click on the Register button
Click on the "Proceed to Checkout" button
Verify that the correct email address and agree to terms on shipping page
Click on the "Proceed to Checkout" button
Verify the correct amount is displayed in the payment screen
Select Bank payment option
Verify user is redirected to the Bank-Wire payment page
Click on the "I confirm my order" button
Verify that the user is presented with their order details
Click "Back to Orders button"
Validate the correct Order details are displayed in the Order history
Click on the "Home" button
Validate that the user is redirected to the home page

name: Feature to test the Ordering of a t-shirt
